ygData.subject: Re: broken skills?
ygData.msgSnippet: ok 2 trys each time in my large sewing kit... slot Row, Coloum slot 1,1: medium quality cat pelt slot 1,2: tunic pattern slot 2,1: stud slot 2,2: stud slot
ygData.messageBody:
ok 2 trys each time in my large sewing kit...

slot Row, Coloum
slot 1,1: medium quality cat pelt
slot 1,2: tunic pattern
slot 2,1: stud
slot 2,2: stud
slot 3,1: stud
slot 3,2: stud
slot 4,1: stud

order shouldn't matter, no items were stacked (studs can't stack if I
remember correctly) and both times got the "does not combine"

needless to say I was not happy, I've dumped about 60-70 plat into smithing
and a bunch into tailoring (not as much) b/c I'm a druid and I want to make
my own armor...I hope it works soon, but I don't want to try again...too
much loss of money when it doesn't work :).

thanks,
Omeg

PS..the guide thought it was a bug and was going to report back the items I
lost and that it happened so I don't know what'll happen, I doubt I'll get
back what I Lost.


>not quite sure what you're doing wrong, but i have made a medium >studded
>tunic
